Name: HyFixes
Description: Essential bug fixes for Hytale Early Access servers. Includes runtime plugin and early plugin bytecode transformers. Prevents crashes, player kicks, combat desync, and sync issues.

com.hyfixes:HyFixes-Runtime.Description: Runtime plugin - Place in mods/ folder

com.hyfixes:HyFixes-Early.Description: Early plugin bytecode transformers - Place in earlyplugins/ folder
